post:
Ready2Frag  -  The host you can depend on.

 

We are continuing these awesome deals!

 



 

Who We Are...

 

Ready2Frag is a new game server, VPS, and dedicated server company. We operate as a branch of HostVenom, LLC. and operate as part of their infrastructure in the Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells facility. We are proud to boast that we own our own suite in the facility, our own hardware in the suite, as well as our own IPv4/IPv6 space!

 

What We Do...

 

To put in just a couple of words, we offer performance hosting solutions. Our Enteprrise-class hardware, including Supermicro chassis, Kingston and Super Talent DDR3 ECC RAM, Western Digital RE3/RE4 HDDs, Samsung 840 Evo and 840 Pro SSDs, LSI MegaRAID RAID Cards, and more allow us to offer awesome reliability at awesome prices. Our route-optimized and DDoS-Protected Chicago, IL network provide excellent routing, low latency, and fast transfer speeds.

 

How We Do It...

 

We accomplish everything said above and more through our dedication to our clients. If you have an issue with your service, we'll not only resolve it, but we'll guarantee you an account credit and ask for your feedback every time you report an issue. Our VPS infrastructure is still relatively new, and we are constantly improving it, so feedback is a necessary part of our business and its continued growth and improvement in the VPS market.

 



 

The Exclusive Deal!

 

Use the "25off" coupon code when ordering to get 25% off your first payment!

 



 

Chicago, IL E3 / SSD KVM VMs

 

The Features:

  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • Pure RAID-10 SSD Storage
  • Intel Xeon E3 Processors
  • Automated Setup
  • DDoS Protection - Up to 4Gbps / 4MPPS
  • 1Gbps Network Ports
 

The Hardware:

  • Intel Xeon E3-1230v2
  • 32GB DDR3 ECC RAM
  • 4x 250GB Samsung 840 Evo SSDs (RAID-10)
  • LSI MegaRAID 9271-4i RAID Card
  • 1Gbps Network Port

The Network:

  • Inbound via GigeNET
  • Outbound via Steadfast Networks
  • 4Gbps/4MPPS DDoS Protection included free!
  • Our own IPv4/IPv6 space!
